about_the_game:
Are you the kind of hopeless home-cook that burns water, or are you the kind of chef that uses teeny-tiny tweezers to adorn your steak with microgreens? Either way, we won't judge you, because this DLC is for cooks of all skill levels!

The Chef's Kiss DLC comes with six premium cooking-related items:
  • Bakery House Skin
  • Donut Rug
  • Cloche
  • Pot Rack
  • Marble Counter
  • Marble Counter with Sink

So even if you've never cracked an egg successfully and all your frozen pizzas come out looking like charcoal, you can at least project an air of baking mastery. Happy cooking!

Note: The cooking activity is part of a free update for all. These items are cosmetic-only.
